item.title: Happy Birthday, Havana!
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Today is Havana's first birthday. We survived the first year and, more importantly, so did she. She's had an eventful year... she's done a lot of traveling: Hawaii in September, Oregon wine country in October, Cannon Beach, Oregon and Mexico in January, a drive to central California and back in March and a trip to Florida in April. She learned to say a few words and a little sign language, she learned to crawl, climb stairs and a few weeks ago, to walk and even stand up on her own. More "photos and videos":http://flickr.com/photos/troyh/sets/72157604826952260/.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: [...] learned to walk, we celebrated her 1st birthday and threw her a party. She’s really grown-up this year and I have a lot of fun playing with [...]
